text: it looks like pdfkit is trying to read files from the local file system, which won't work since these files don't exist within the serverless function. Sounds similar to the feedback you got here <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C011F74BKQW/p1615535398061200?thread_ts=1615523306.057800&cid=C011F74BKQW>
